title: [Large-scale] Augmented Reality-based Campus Plant Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Botany Knowledge and Mobile Device Usage Skills
context.additional_context: A course where in-service secondary teachers explore campus plants using AR technology and conduct language-integrated learning activities. Includes intensive fieldwork and project-based assessments over one week.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify over 20 plant species on campus using an AR-based mobile app.
Learners analyze 3D models, ecological characteristics, and cultural significance of plants via AR and create portfolios linked to verbal explanations.
Learners develop and present plant observation reports and language curriculum-integrated activity plans based on field learning data.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
